summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Simon Flee DJ presskit website. All core features working correctly including hero section, genre marquee, bio with highlighted tags, click-to-load music players, social links, tech rider table, contact section, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Copyright shows 2024 instead of 2025, but this is expected dynamic behavior

passed_tests: Hero section loads with artist name 'SIMON FLEE' and photo
Genre marquee animation displays all 6 genres (House, Techno, Breaks, Acid, Trance, IDM)
Bio section shows full biography with 6 highlighted genre tags
Music player section has Mixcloud and SoundCloud players with click-to-load functionality
Clicking player covers successfully reveals embedded players
Links section displays all 6 social links with correct URLs and hover effects
Tech Rider table shows 3 equipment items with proper status indicators
Contact section displays 4 contact methods with clickable links
Footer shows location info (Bucharest â†’ Brussels)
Mobile responsiveness works correctly across all sections
